name: The Temple of Raw
description:
GAMEPAD

  • A - JUMP
  • X - ACTION
  • D-PAD/LEFT STICK - DIRECTIONAL

KEYBOARD

  • WASD - DIRECTIONAL
  • SPACE - JUMP
  • ENTER  - ACTION

Known Bugs:

For one user the ENTER key did not advance dialogue.  If you are playing with keyboard pressing ESC does advance dialog as well.  This bug aside GAMEPAD is recommended for this game.
